ARABIC: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I fear, were I to disobey my Lord, the punishment of a Terrible Day.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "If I disobey my Lord, I fear the punishment of an evil Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “If I disobey my Lord, I fear the chastisement of an Awesome Day.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "I am afraid that for disobeying my Lord I shall suffer the torment of the great day".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say, “Were I to disobey my Lord, I too would fear the punishment of the great Day (of Resurrection).”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Verily, if I disobey my Lord, I am afraid of the torment of a great Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: I fear, if I disobey my Lord, the chastisement of a grievous day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Truly I fear, if I should rebel against my Lord, the chastisement of a dreadful day.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Lo! if I should disobey my Lord, I fear the doom of a tremendous Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "I fear, if I disobey my Lord, the punishment of a Terrible Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: verily fear, if I disobeyed my Lord, torment of a Day mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Indeed, should I disobey my Lord, I fear the punishment of a tremendous day.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "I would, if I disobeyed my Lord, indeed have fear of the Penalty of a Mighty Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Verily, if I disobey my Lord, I am afraid of the torment of a great Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Indeed, if I rebel against my Lord I fear the punishment of a dreadful Day'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “I fear, if I disobeyed my Lord, the punishment of a horrendous Day.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:13] Say: ‘Indeed, should I disobey my Lord, I fear the chastisement of a tremendous day’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (Lo! if I should disobey my Lord) if I revert to your religion, (I fear) I know I will face (the doom of a tremendous Day) a severe and variegated chastisement.
